instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the estimation of porosity in the study that investigated an alternative method to estimate porosity in carbonate rocks using pointwise hyperspectral data and machine learning, and how far can this metric go?

The study found that most of the models trained achieved a coefficient of determination above 0.8, indicating a strong relationship between the estimated porosity and the spectral data. Therefore, the metric can go up to a value of 1, indicating a perfect fit between the estimated porosity and the ground-truth values.
